cidr_block.description: The CIDR block for the VPC.

instance_tenancy.description: A tenancy option for instances launched into the VPC

enable_dns_support.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable DNS support in the VPC. Defaults true.

enable_dns_hostnames.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable DNS hostnames in the VPC. Defaults false.

enable_classiclink.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable ClassicLink

enable_classiclink_dns_support.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable ClassicLink DNS Support for the VPC.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

cidr_block.description: The CIDR block of the VPC

instance_tenancy.description: Tenancy of instances spin up within VPC.

enable_dns_support.description: Whether or not the VPC has DNS support

enable_dns_hostnames.description: Whether or not the VPC has DNS hostname support

enable_classiclink.description: Whether or not the VPC has Classiclink enabled

main_route_table_id.description: The ID of the main route table associated with

default_network_acl_id.description: The ID of the network ACL created by default on VPC creation

default_security_group_id.description: The ID of the security group created by default on VPC creation

default_route_table_id.description: The ID of the route table created by default on VPC creation

ipv6_association_id.description: The association ID for the IPv6 CIDR block.

owner_id.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the VPC.
